name: Pippols
overview: A long time ago, in the world of Magic, people and fairies were living happily together. But one day, the fairies of darkness stole the light and the world turned into black. Pippols has decided to bring back the light to the world. The brave boy starts seeking the Holy Gem towards Neverland. However, the fairies of darkness try to stop him on the way. Pippols will have to travel across several countries like the flower country, the forest country or the moaï country before reaching Neverland. Will Pippols be able to get to Neverland and bring back home the Holy Gem?
